title: Cafe Louise - Drorim
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe is behind the Drorim Shopping Mall. Vegan items are marked and include a vegan breakfast, mushroom-tofu paella, "skinny pasta," salads, and more. Quieter inside. Crowded on Friday and Saturday mornings, so get there early. Reservations accepted from 1pm.
